definition: to hang up (a picture etc)/to hoist up (a flag)/(computing) to suspend (a process)/(of a system) to hang/pending (operation)

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
to feel unconcerned and let matters rest (idiom)
pinyin: shi4 bu4 guan1 ji3 , gao1 gao1 gua4 qi3

sentences.english: They strung up coloured lights round the room.
sentences.chinese: 他們在房間四周掛起了彩燈。

sentences.english: Inthe back yard, someone had tied one end of a hammock to a tree.
sentences.chinese: 有人在後院的樹上掛起了吊牀。

sentences.english: The big sail won't stay in position unless you trice it up.
sentences.chinese: 除非你掛起船帆並用繩縛住，否則它就不能穩住。

sentences.english: We should make our lives relevant to the needs of the country.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該使個人生活與國家的需要掛起鉤來。

sentences.english: Select Process the Pending Request and install the certificate , and then click Next .
sentences.chinese: 選擇處理掛起的請求並安裝證書，然後單擊下一步。

sentences.english: The white flag was run up;the post had surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 白旗高高掛起，駐軍業已投降。

sentences.english: And if a lock can get stuck, it can be very difficult to make it gracefully release.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個鎖被掛起，順利地釋放它會很難。

sentences.english: Not all files in the pending check-in are within the currently open solution.
sentences.chinese: 掛起簽入中的某些文件不屬於當前打開的解決方案。

sentences.english: There daily I wander as noon rises high.
sentences.chinese: 正午的驕陽高高掛起，那是我日常漫步的去處。

sentences.english: Using the Check In and Pending Changes Windows.
sentences.chinese: 使用“簽入”和“掛起的更改”窗口。

sentences.english: That program would, every so often, print a prompt, then hang up on you.
sentences.chinese: 這種程序會非常頻繁地輸出一個提示，然後掛起不動。

sentences.english: Is it yourself, high and hang up?
sentences.chinese: 是事不關己，高高掛起嗎？

sentences.english: Do not hang up and swat carpets or rugsmats as this will create aerosols.
sentences.chinese: 不應掛起或拍打地氈及墊子，以免產生懸浮微粒。

sentences.english: You can leave it either in pending state or active state.
sentences.chinese: 您可以讓數據庫停留在掛起狀態或活動狀態。

sentences.english: Then put the bottom rod through the bottom rod pocket of door panel and let it hang.
sentences.chinese: 然後將通過門底條口袋底部杆面板並讓它掛起。

sentences.english: What are server hangs and crashes?
sentences.chinese: 何爲服務器掛起和崩潰？
